WorkItem.Description:
Mods for mapping, GPS, comms and other features (as well as upcoming game features) require a number of craft in orbit in order to provide the feature. 

Extend orbit features to load a list of craft (or copies of a single craft) and place each craft in the same or differing orbits based on parameters. 

Provide common orbit group templates like:

* traditional US GPS system
* geo-sync
* polar orbit mapping
* comms relay network
* suggestions for constellation types and popular orbits are welcome!

Comments.Message: Moved to 0.3.0 to make reasonable release time of 0.2.0
